messages.message: Hey team, this is a super last minute request but would someone be able to take over my oncall shift? I'm on the shadow rotation this week
if its shadowing, then maybe @prateek.tenkale and you can switch since you two should both be shadowing on-call right now
I shadowed Jessica for on call a month ago already I think, but I don't mind shadowing again
feel like two shadows is enough to fully be on the on-call rotation. @Serena did we codify this somewhere? i may have missed it
historically i've just pinged people when i see that they have shadowed on-call multiple times

to answer your original question, we can remove you from the on-call group if desired @Sayan or switch you with Prateek (see question below)

primary and secondary are supposed to cover things anyways
to follow up on Andy's question, @prateek.tenkale are you ok with moving into the on-call rotation? or do you want another week of shadowing?
Another week of shadowing would be preferred, I've been making good progress for HR so don't want it to disrupt the current sprint too much
